definition: lit. a new-born calf has no fear of the tiger (idiom)/fig. the fearlessness of youth
pinyin: chu1 sheng1 zhi1 du2 bu4 wei4 hu3

definition: not to submit to force (idiom); to defy threats and violence
not to submit to force (idiom); to defy threats and violence

sentences.english: In particular - he says - there's no climate of respecting failure.
sentences.chinese: 他特别指出，印度人向来不畏失败。

sentences.english: Then there are the few brae souls who grab at its horns and hang on at all costs.
sentences.chinese: 只有极少数的灵魂不畏艰险，不惜一切。

sentences.english: He held out his hand unflinchingly for the cane.
sentences.chinese: 他毫不畏缩地伸出手去挨藤条打。

sentences.english: Death reaches everywhere, does not fear royal palaces.
Acceptdisa ppointment  and learn to persevere, to pursue your dreamsdesp ite pitfalls.
sentences.chinese: 接受挫败并学会坚持，不畏风险地追求你的梦想。

sentences.english: Jane didn't flinch once when the doctor cleaned the cut in her arm.
sentences.chinese: 医生为琼清洗手臂上的伤口时，她毫不畏缩。

sentences.english: The soldiers are face their difficulties directly without fear.
sentences.chinese: 战士们直面困难，不畏艰险。

sentences.english: We shall brave the tides and keep the business going until next year.
sentences.chinese: 我们应该不畏艰难，经营我们的事业到明年。

sentences.english: The cost of this unflinching reappraisal will be large.
sentences.chinese: 毫不畏缩地进行重新评估成本会很高。

sentences.english: Many years ago a group of confessors built this church.
sentences.chinese: 很多年以前，一群不畏受难的基督徒修建了这座教堂。

sentences.english: Fache never flinched, his eyes riveted on the second agent.
sentences.chinese: 法希毫不畏缩，他的眼睛一动不动地注视着那名特工。

sentences.english: Consecration is resolution that is not afraid of sacrifice.
sentences.chinese: 奉献是不畏牺牲的决心。

sentences.english: It is your fearlessness of danger and difficulty who brings hope to people in desperation.
sentences.chinese: 是你们的不畏艰险给绝望中的人们带来了希望。

sentences.english: Time chasing the wind driven residues, defying thorn spend about butterfly.
sentences.chinese: 风赶残云云追月，蝶不畏刺花有约。

sentences.english: Only if he possesses the True One, can he fear nothing.
sentences.chinese: 唯有真一，可以一切不畏也。

sentences.english: Most of them faced up to the hardships of pioneering without thought of personal gain or loss.
sentences.chinese: 他们大多数人不计个人得失，不畏创业的艰辛。

definition: one falls, the next follows (idiom); stepping into the breach to replace fallen comrades/advancing wave upon wave
bravery with no thought of personal safety (idiom); risking life and limb/undaunted by perils
to view death as a return home/to not be afraid of dying/to face death with equanimity (idiom)
to advance dauntlessly in wave upon wave (idiom)
dauntless/to summon up courage and determination/using extreme force of will
see 一往無前|一往无前[yi1 wang3 wu2 qian2]
to flee/to go into exile (from prison)
to go all out for sth at risk of one's life
